meanings.definition: Relating to the palm of the hand.
meanings.sent1: The thenal skin is smooth and sensitive.
meanings.sent2: She felt the warmth of the sun on her thenal palm.
meanings.sent3: The thenal lotion made her hands feel like silk.
meanings.sent4: His thenal touch was gentle yet firm.
meanings.sent5: The thenal sensation of sand slipping through her fingers was comforting.

meanings.definition: Located on the palm of the hand.
meanings.sent1: The thenal veins were visible under the skin.
meanings.sent2: He wore a ring on his thenal finger.
meanings.sent3: The thenal print of her hand was left on the glass.
meanings.sent4: The thenal lines on his hand told a story of hard work.
meanings.sent5: She felt the thenal weight of the object in her hand.
